          <title>
            <string language="es">Caudal de ni y tau</string>
            <string language="en">Disappearance of nu and tau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschwinden von nu und von tau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Disparition de nu et de tau</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Scomparsa del nu e del tau</string>

          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Objeto en flash que ilustra el fenómeno fonético de la caída de las consonantes griegas ni y tau.</string>
            <string language="en">Flash object which illustrates the phonetic phenomenon of the disappearance of the Greek consonants nu and tau.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tercera declinación</string>
            <string language="en">third declension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grelle Nachricht, die das Lautphänomen des 
Verschwindens des griechischen Konsonanten nu und des tau 
veranschaulicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objet instantané qui illustre le phénomène 
phonétique de la disparition du nu et du tau grecs de consonnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objeto flash que ilustra o fenômeno fonético do
disappearance do nu e do tau gregos das consoantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oggetto istantaneo che illustra il fenomeno 
fonetico della scomparsa del nu e del tau greci di consonanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντικείμενο λάμψης που επεξηγεί το φωνητικό φαινόμενο
της εξαφάνισης των ελληνικών συμφώνων NU και του TAU.</string>
          </description>
